overview: Veronica Avluv: She loves her husband. She just loves new dick even more. Evita Pozzi: She never minds when her husband travels for business! Cherie DeVille: Her husband paid for those tits to that all her lovers could enjoy them! Monique Alexander: She always encourages her husband to hang out with his friends.
tagline: Some vows are meant to be broken.
title: A Married Woman
